Entry.JapaneseText: ミナールはどんな街なんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: What kind of place is Minal?

Entry.JapaneseText: 首都バルカとの定期船も往来する 大きな港街だ。
Entry.EnglishText: It's a large port town with a boat service that goes to and from the capital, Balka.

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズからは、あまり外に 出た事はなかった……
Entry.EnglishText: No, I've barely stepped foot outside of Sulz...

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか……旅に出たと思ったら、それが クレアさんを助ける旅だなんて……皮肉だよネ……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh... So your first journey out of the village is to save Claire... Probably not how you thought that would go.
